About Me

Let me tell you a bit about myself...

Your Project In Safe Hands

I have recently relocated to Kent and look forward to being an active member of the local creative arts community. I had an established fired glass business in New Zealand but have been travelling and working in the UK and France for the last ten years. I am now returning to my passion for kiln formed vessels. I am very excited to be in my new studio and look forward to seeing were this new reinvention of J S Design leads. WATCH THIS SPACE.
